devdoc.details: Shows how different visibility types behave in inheritance

f1().details: Public function visible both internally and externally

f4().details: External function visible only outside the contract

child_var.details: Calls internal function from parent contract

child_var2.details: Attempts to call external function from parentCurrent solution: Changed to use this.f4() to demonstrate external call

child_var4.details: Calls public function from parent contract

devdoc.title: Child Contract Demonstrating Inheritance

child_var().notice: Works because internal functions are accessible in child contracts

child_var2().notice: This would fail because external functions can't be called directly internallyFixed by either: 1. Changing f4() to public in parent contract (recommended) 2. Using this.f4() to force external call

child_var4().notice: Works because public functions are fully accessible

f1().notice: Can be called: - From within this contract - From child contracts - From other contracts - From transactions

f4().notice: Can be called: - From other contracts (via this.f4()) - From transactions - NOT from within this contract (without using this.f4()) - NOT from child contracts (without using this.f4())
